templates.author: Microsoft
templates.name: Cost Optimization (Preview)
templates.description: This workbook surfaces key recommendations that can directly impact cost savings. These recommendations include identifying and addressing idle resources, leveraging Azure Advisor recommendations such as Reserved Instances and Savings Plans for Compute, and optimizing the usage of oversized VMs.
